name: group.contains()
content: Checks if the sprite is in the group.

palette_params.name: sprite
palette_params.description: The sprite you want to find in the group.

short_description: Checks if the sprite is in the group.
tips: - Groups of sprites all have the same functions and you use the dot notation (combining the name of the group, followed by a dot, with the function name) to call the function for that group of sprites.
